asgn2Simulators

Class Flights

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn2Simulators.Flights

  • public class Flights
extends java.lang.Object
    Flights is a utility class to hold a collection of Aircraft for a single day. Most of the methods rely on those of Aircraft, visiting each aircraft in the daily flight list.
    Author:
    hogan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Flights(int time)
      Constructor creates a defined set of daily services.

        public Flights(int time)
        throws AircraftException
        Constructor creates a defined set of daily services.

    • Method Detail

      • addPassenger

        public void addPassenger(Passenger p,
                int time)
                  throws AircraftException,
                         PassengerException
        Adds a Passenger to one of the aircraft in the flight list. Precondition is a call to seatsAvailable(Passenger)
        Parameters:
        p - Passenger to be added
        time - int time operation performed
        Throws:
        AircraftException - See Aircraft.confirmBooking(Passenger, int)
        PassengerException - See Aircraft.confirmBooking(Passenger, int)

      • cancelBookings

        public java.util.List<Passenger> cancelBookings(java.util.Random rng,
                                       double cancelProb,
                                       int cancelTime)
                                         throws PassengerException,
                                                AircraftException
        Cancel bookings across the daily schedule based on cancellation probability
        Parameters:
        rng - Random - the active random number generator object
        cancelProb - double Bernoulli trial cancellation probability
        cancelTime - int cancellation time
        Returns:
        List of cancelled passengers
        Throws:
        PassengerException - See Aircraft.cancelBooking(Passenger, int)
        AircraftException - See Aircraft.cancelBooking(Passenger, int)

      • flyPassengers

        public void flyPassengers(int time)
                   throws PassengerException
        Flies passengers across the daily schedule
        Parameters:
        time - int time operation performed
        Throws:
        PassengerException - See Aircraft.flyPassengers(int)

      • getCurrentCounts

        public Bookings getCurrentCounts()
        Get the total passenger counts, for each fare class, in total, and seats remaining
        Returns:
        Bookings object containing the counts

      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus(int time)
        Wrapper to return the status fields of all aircraft in the schedule. Used primarily for logging. Note that status field includes state transitions
        Parameters:
        time - int current time step
        Returns:
        String concatenating Aircraft status information

      • initialState

        public java.lang.String initialState()
        Wrapper to return initial state information for all aircraft in the schedule. Used primarily for logging.
        Returns:
        String concatenating Aircraft initial state information

      • seatsAvailable

        public boolean seatsAvailable(Passenger p)
        Given a Passenger, method determines whether there are seats available in that fare class across the daily schedule
        Parameters:
        p - Passenger to be Confirmed
        Returns:
        boolean true if seats in Class(p); false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • upgradePassengers

        public void upgradePassengers()
        Method to upgrade Passengers to try to fill the aircraft seating. Passengers are upgraded solely within their original aircraft. We do not move passengers between flights in the schedule.
